scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data (income, address, etc.) from a publicly accessible credit scoring API by performing a model inversion attack.  The attacker crafts numerous requests to the API, subtly varying inputs to infer internal model parameters and customer data.
initial_goal: Determine the internal workings of the credit scoring model and infer personal customer data from the API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A credit scoring API used for loan applications and risk assessment is targeted.
